title: [1.8.9/1.7.10][ssp/smp]Realistic Torches--真实火把-让MC更科学
author: 冷傲—风
txt_content:
本帖最后由 冷傲—风 于 2016-3-13 10:40 编辑 

Hi，大家好
这次为大家带来的是
真实火把
属于微调的


原文

Torches are now unlit after being crafted, and must be lit using a matchbox in a crafting grid or flint and steel after being placed. As a result, the matchbox must be acquired before players can explore caves safely, prevent hostiles from spawning, etc.Torches will burn out after a specified amount of time (60 minutes real time by default, can be changed in the config) and become unlit. This encourages players to seek more permanent light sources early on, such as lava or glowstone.Certain items and blocks (torches, glowstone dust and blocks, lava buckets, etc.) will emit light when held. This feature is disabled by default due to possible performance issues but can be enabled in the config.Torch recipes added by other mods will be removed to ensure that the matchbox or flint and steel must be acquired to craft lit torches (can be disabled in the config).Translations for English, Spanish, French, Portuguese, and Pirate.

这个MOD是让火把科学一点
首先大家都知道吧，合成火把




哎，这火把怎么是黑的，别着急
放在方块上


然后拿打火石右键


亮了，觉得太麻烦也可以简单点
合成个火柴盒


然后把火柴盒跟熄灭的火把合成


就可以直接合成火把了，为什么我自己觉得还是很麻烦=  =
在下雨天时不能在露天放火把，会熄灭
火把有维持时间，是60分钟
可以在配置中设置最近作者更新了1.2版本这次更新的内容很简单

可永久点燃，不会熄灭

自带中文，不用汉化而且上次我没注意1.7.10的这次就放到云盘里度娘支持作者：1.8.9
支持作者：1.7.10

作者更新到了1.5.1貌似只是修改了一下BUG
最后感谢这位小伙伴提醒我更新了@秋天007
[fly]求人气，砸金粒[/fly]
